c74object.name: varibuffer~
c74object.description: varibuffer~ lets you operate with a group of buffer~ objects. Each buffer~ will be named after varibuffer~ first argument and an index (e.g. for a varibuffer~ toto object, each buffer~ will be named toto.1, toto.2, toto.3 ...). This is an emulation of the standard polybuffer~ object.

inlet.description: The following messages are supported: append, appendempty, clear, dump, getbufferlist, getcount, getshortname, getsize, open, readfolder, send, wclose, writetofolder.

outlet.description: Outputs results of dump, getcount, getbufferlist, etc.

objarg.name: name
objarg.description: Sets the name of the varibuffer~ and defines the names of the buffer~ objects.

method.name: append
method.digest: Add a sound file to the varibuffer~
method.description: Adds a sound file to the varibuffer~. If no filename is provided, a dialog will appear.

method.name: appendempty
method.description: Adds an empty buffer~ with the specified length (in ms) and channels.

method.name: clear
method.description: Deletes all buffer~ objects managed by this varibuffer~.

method.name: dump
method.description: Outputs a list for each buffer: index, name, path, duration, channels, samplerate.

method.name: getbufferlist
method.description: Outputs each buffer name followed by a 'done' message.

method.name: getcount
method.description: Outputs the message 'count' followed by the number of buffers.

method.name: getshortname
method.digest: Output buffer names and short filenames
method.description: Outputs each buffer name and its filename without extension, followed by 'done'.

method.name: getsize
method.description: Outputs the total memory size used by the buffers in bytes.

method.name: open
method.description: Opens a window to see information about the buffers.

method.name: readfolder
method.digest: Load all files from a folder
method.description: Loads multiple sound files from the specified folder. If no argument is provided, a dialog will appear.

method.name: send
method.description: Sends a message to the specified buffer index (0 for all).

method.name: writetofolder
method.digest: Write all buffers to a folder
method.description: Writes every buffer to a folder.

attr.name: embed
attr.description: If enabled, buffer references are saved in the patcher.

attr.name: quiet
attr.description: If enabled, suppresses warnings when loading multiple patches with the same name.
